regen.absent_element: specification for alert generation after record changes
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alert to staff members and patrons when a record change is made, based on their privileges and notification settings.
The system shall trigger an alert to staff members and patrons when a record change is made.
The system shall trigger alerts to staff members and patrons when changes are made to records, based on predefined trigger conditions.

label: The system shall warn when a record is changed.
absence: action of warning when a record is changed
